scripts.prebuild: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue 'dist\sweet-portofolio'; Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue 'dist\sweet-portofolio.zip'; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue 'dist\assets'; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue 'dist\src'; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue 'dist\templates'; Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue 'dist\README.md'; Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue 'dist\sweet-portofolio.php'; \$paths = @('dist\sweet-portofolio\assets\css','dist\sweet-portofolio\assets\js','dist\sweet-portofolio\src','dist\sweet-portofolio\templates'); foreach (\$p in \$paths) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path \$p | Out-Null }"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:production: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.copy-assets: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Recurse -Force -Path assets\* -Destination dist\sweet-portofolio\assets" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Recurse -Force -Path src\* -Destination dist\sweet-portofolio\src" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Recurse -Force -Path templates\* -Destination dist\sweet-portofolio\templates" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Path sweet-portofolio.php -Destination dist\sweet-portofolio\ -Force" && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Path README.md -Destination dist\sweet-portofolio\ -Force"
scripts.zip: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Set-Location 'dist'; Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue 'sweet-portofolio.zip'; npx bestzip sweet-portofolio.zip sweet-portofolio/*"
